caption.title: Screening strategy to select mAbs specific for sGP, GP or both following mice immunization.
caption.p: The different steps used for mAbs screening are depicted as well as the number of mAbs and pairs selected following each step. EIA: Enzyme Immunoassay; ELISA: Enzyme-linked Immunosorbent Assays. See methods for experimental details.
Click here for additional data file.
